/**
 * @file CodeViewer.js
 * @description 代码查看组件，展示生成的代码文件
 * 
 * 需求:
 * 1. 展示代码内容，支持语法高亮
 * 2. 提供文件树导航，支持多文件切换
 * 3. 支持代码折叠和搜索
 * 4. 提供代码下载功能
 * 5. 代码行号和复制功能
 * 
 * 组件属性:
 * - files: 代码文件对象数组，包含path和content
 * - generation: 生成结果对象
 */import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Box,Flex,VStack,HStack,Text,Button,Heading,Divider,useColorModeValue,IconButton,Tooltip,Menu,MenuButton,MenuList,MenuItem,Code,Select}from'@chakra-ui/react';import{DownloadIcon,CopyIcon,ChevronRightIcon,ChevronDownIcon,SearchIcon,HamburgerIcon}from'@chakra-ui/icons';/**
 * 获取文件扩展名对应的语言
 * @param {string} fileName 文件名
 * @returns {string} 语言名称
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const getLanguageFromFilename=fileName=>{const ext=fileName.split('.').pop().toLowerCase();const languageMap={'js':'javascript','jsx':'jsx','ts':'typescript','tsx':'tsx','py':'python','html':'html','css':'css','json':'json','md':'markdown','java':'java','c':'c','cpp':'cpp','go':'go','rs':'rust','php':'php','rb':'ruby','sh':'bash','yml':'yaml','yaml':'yaml','sql':'sql','graphql':'graphql','swift':'swift','kt':'kotlin'};return languageMap[ext]||'text';};/**
 * 简化版代码查看组件，不使用react-syntax-highlighter
 */const CodeViewer=_ref=>{let{files=[],generation=null}=_ref;const[selectedFile,setSelectedFile]=useState(null);const[selectedContent,setSelectedContent]=useState('');const[showLineNumbers,setShowLineNumbers]=useState(true);// 将所有Hook移到组件顶层
const isDarkMode=useColorModeValue(false,true);const bgColor=useColorModeValue('white','gray.800');const borderColor=useColorModeValue('gray.200','gray.600');const codeBgColor=useColorModeValue('gray.50','gray.700');// 文件树状态
const[expandedFolders,setExpandedFolders]=useState({});// 初始选择第一个文件
useEffect(()=>{if(files.length>0&&!selectedFile){setSelectedFile(files[0].path);setSelectedContent(files[0].content);}},[files,selectedFile]);// 文件选择处理
const handleFileSelect=path=>{const file=files.find(f=>f.path===path);if(file){setSelectedFile(path);setSelectedContent(file.content);}};// 复制代码处理
const handleCopyCode=()=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(selectedContent);};// 处理文件夹展开/折叠
const toggleFolder=folderPath=>{setExpandedFolders(prev=>({...prev,[folderPath]:!prev[folderPath]}));};// 按目录组织文件
const organizeFilesByDirectory=()=>{const result={};files.forEach(file=>{const parts=file.path.split('/');const fileName=parts.pop();const directory=parts.join('/');if(!result[directory]){result[directory]=[];}result[directory].push({name:fileName,path:file.path,content:file.content});});return result;};const filesByDirectory=organizeFilesByDirectory();// 渲染文件树
const renderFileTree=()=>{const directories=Object.keys(filesByDirectory).sort();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VStack,{align:"stretch",spacing:0,children:directories.map(directory=>{const isRoot=directory==='';const isExpanded=expandedFolders[directory]!==false;// 默认展开
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[!isRoot&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{py:1,px:2,cursor:"pointer",onClick:()=>toggleFolder(directory),fontSize:"sm",fontWeight:"bold",alignItems:"center",children:[isExpanded?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChevronDownIcon,{mr:1}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChevronRightIcon,{mr:1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:directory})]}),isExpanded&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VStack,{align:"stretch",spacing:0,pl:isRoot?0:4,children:filesByDirectory[directory].sort((a,b)=>a.name.localeCompare(b.name)).map(file=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{py:1,px:2,cursor:"pointer",borderRadius:"md",bg:file.path===selectedFile?'blue.50':'transparent',_hover:{bg:file.path===selectedFile?'blue.50':'gray.50'},onClick:()=>handleFileSelect(file.path),fontSize:"sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{children:["\uD83D\uDCC4 ",file.name]})},file.path))})]},directory||'root');})});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{h:"full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{justify:"space-between",align:"center",mb:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{size:"md",children:"\u4EE3\u7801\u67E5\u770B\u5668"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HStack,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"sm",variant:"outline",leftIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DownloadIcon,{}),onClick:()=>{if(generation&&generation.id){window.open(`/api/generations/${generation.id}/download`,'_blank');}},children:"\u4E0B\u8F7D\u5168\u90E8"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{h:"calc(100% - 60px)",borderWidth:"1px",borderRadius:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{w:"250px",borderRightWidth:"1px",bg:bgColor,overflowY:"auto",children:renderFileTree()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{flex:"1",position:"relative",children:selectedFile?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{justify:"space-between",align:"center",p:2,borderBottomWidth:"1px",bg:codeBgColor,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontWeight:"bold",fontSize:"sm",children:selectedFile}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{label:"\u663E\u793A/\u9690\u85CF\u884C\u53F7",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"xs",variant:showLineNumbers?"solid":"outline",onClick:()=>setShowLineNumbers(!showLineNumbers),children:"\u884C\u53F7"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{label:"\u590D\u5236\u4EE3\u7801",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{size:"xs",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CopyIcon,{}),onClick:handleCopyCode,"aria-label":"\u590D\u5236\u4EE3\u7801"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{overflowY:"auto",h:"calc(100% - 40px)",fontSize:"sm",p:4,fontFamily:"monospace",whiteSpace:"pre",bg:isDarkMode?'gray.800':'white',color:isDarkMode?'white':'black',children:showLineNumbers?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{style:{borderCollapse:'collapse',width:'100%'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:selectedContent.split('\n').map((line,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{lineHeight:'1.5'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{color:isDarkMode?'gray.400':'gray.500',textAlign:'right',paddingRight:'1rem',userSelect:'none',width:'1%',whiteSpace:'nowrap',borderRight:'1px solid',borderColor:isDarkMode?'gray.600':'gray.200'},children:i+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{paddingLeft:'1rem'},children:line})]},i))})}):selectedContent})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flex,{h:"100%",justify:"center",align:"center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{color:"gray.500",children:"\u8BF7\u9009\u62E9\u6587\u4EF6\u67E5\u770B\u4EE3\u7801"})})})]})]});};export default CodeViewer;
